nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: Captain, the path forks here. My scanner is picking up faint life signs from under a rockfall to the left. To the right, there's a sealed vault emitting a low power signature, likely containing supplies.

choices.text: Kim, what are the chances of a successful rescue?
[Previous Loop] "The 'colonists' are a lure. The real prize is the data cache hidden behind the vault's power supply."

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Sir, we're low on medical supplies and ammo. That vault could be the difference between life and death for us. The colonists... it's a hard choice, but our crew has to come first.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: Their life signs are weak, but stable. We have a good chance of getting them out if we act quickly. We can't just leave them here to die, Captain.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You take a moment to weigh the options. The ground trembles slightly.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: Another tremor, stronger this time! Captain, the rubble is shifting! The life signs are fading! We have to decide now!

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: A hidden cache? Behind the vault? That's... oddly specific, Captain. But I trust you. Kim, forget the life signs. We're going for that vault.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: The choice is yours. The lives of strangers, or the well-being of your crew.

choices.text: We're attempting the rescue. Get to work.
We need the supplies. Open the vault.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: It's a lot of rock. We can try to lift it with brute force, or Kim can use the sonic emitters to try and break it up more precisely.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: The vault lock is electronic, but ancient. I can try to bypass it, but if I fail, it will likely trigger defenses.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: We've got them! They're weak, but alive. They were... colonists, from a generation ship that crashed decades ago.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: It's no good, the whole passage came down! The life signs are gone. We... we were too late.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: We're in! Medical supplies, ammo, ration packs... it's a treasure trove! We're back in fighting shape.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: The lockdown failed! It's an energy trap! The vault is flooding with radiation!

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You chose to save the colonists, upholding your duty to protect human life.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You chose to prioritize your crew, securing vital supplies for the journey ahead.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your attempt failed, leaving you with nothing but injuries and regret.
